text: ye kehte to hai ke ita’ath hai, phir jab aap ke paas se ut kar baaher nikalte hai to un mein ki ek jamaath, jo baath aap ne ya us ne kahi hai us ke qilaaf raatho ko mashwere karti hai,un ki raatho ki baath cheeth Allah likh raha hai,to aap un se mu pher le aur Allah par bharosa rakhe,Allah ta’ala kaafi kaar saaz hai
